sentence.Network_en: They suggest that my motives for proposing reform are self-serving and mercenary.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们暗示说我之所以提议改革是贪图金钱，想谋取私利。

sentence.Network_en: Industry has been quick to fill the gap with largely self - serving publications.
sentence.Network_cn: 公司企业立刻用 自我 吹嘘的出版物来填补这种不足.

sentence.Network_en: He had a reputation for being politically officious and self - serving.
sentence.Network_cn: 他因在政治上爱管闲事和个人奋斗而出名.

entry.tran: 只为个人打算的;一心谋私利的
entry.def: If you describe someone as self-serving, you are critical of them because they are only interested in what they can get for themselves.

example.ex: They suggest that my motives for proposing reform are self-serving and mercenary.
example.tran: 他们暗示说我之所以提议改革是贪图金钱，想谋取私利。
贪污腐败、一心谋私利的政治家们
